ygData.subject: Re: get this
ygData.msgSnippet: I was talking with a few friends who all play everquest...and we think we came up with a pretty good idea....instead of HT just damaging someone or
ygData.messageBody:
I was talking with a few friends who all play everquest...and we think we
came up with a pretty good idea....instead of HT just damaging someone or
something...why not do the damage...and send us the amount of HP it
drains. That way we can do damage..and a good amount...and heal at the
same time. Why not have it so it heals as much as it drains. It wil make
up for the lack of healing or HP giving spells we get and do the damage.
Also make it less resistable too.

Korm
Cazic Thule
